name: Pixling World (itch)
description:
Capture and breed a team of AI creatures and battle them against other players! 

Pixling World is inhabited by Pixlings; a virtual creature that can have a number of features and neural network brains. Your task is to capture and breed a team of Pixlings, and then battle them against other players teams! Pixlings evolve by mutation, so as they reproduce they get stronger and smarter, and you can even help evolution along by breeding Pixlings you think look promising.

  • Real neural network brains with lots of senses (vision, smell, distance sense, memory etc.) and actions they can take
  • Real evolution through mutations of both their neural networks and their features
  • Ladder system where you can battle other players teams
  • Huge worlds with up to 16,000 Pixlings simultaneously!
  • Lots of actions and abilities, such as melee, eating things, equipping things, stomping, lazer eyes and much more
  • Plenty of tools to breed the best team
